{
    public static readonly TransactionId Empty = new TransactionId(0);
    public TransactionId(long value)
    {
        Value = value;
    }

    public long Value { get; }

    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IEquatable{{T}}"/>
    public bool Equals(TransactionId other) => Value.Equals(other.Value);
    public override bool Equals(object? obj)
    {
        if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj))
            return false;
        return obj is TransactionId other && Equals(other);
    }

    public override int GetHashCode() => Value.GetHashCode();

    public int CompareTo(TransactionId other) => Value.CompareTo(other.Value);

#if NET7_0_OR_GREATER

    public static bool TryParse(string? input, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider, out TransactionId result)
    {
        if (long.TryParse(input, provider, out var value))
        {
            result = new(value);
            return true;
        }
        else
        {
            result = default;
            return false;
        }
    }

            return false;

#endif
#if NET8_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IUtf8SpanParsable{{TSelf}}.TryParse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan{{byte}}, global::System.IFormatProvider?, out TSelf)"/>
    public static bool TryParse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Text, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider, out TransactionId result)
    {
        if (long.TryParse(utf8Text, provider, out var value))
        {
            result = new TransactionId(value);
            return true;
        }

        result = default;
        return false;
    }
#endif

    public override string ToString() => Value.ToString();
    public static TransactionId Parse(string input) => new(long.Parse(input));
    public static bool operator ==(TransactionId left, TransactionId right) => left.Equals(right);
    public static bool operator !=(TransactionId left, TransactionId right) => !(left == right);
    public static bool operator>(TransactionId a, TransactionId b) => a.CompareTo(b) > 0;
    public static bool operator <(TransactionId a, TransactionId b) => a.CompareTo(b) < 0;
    public static bool operator >=(TransactionId a, TransactionId b) => a.CompareTo(b) >= 0;
    public static bool operator <=(TransactionId a, TransactionId b) => a.CompareTo(b) <= 0;
    /// <summary>
    /// Implicitly converts a <see cref="Int64"/> to a <see cref="TransactionId"/>.
    /// </summary>
    public static implicit operator TransactionId(long value) => new TransactionId(value);
    /// <summary>
    /// Explicitly converts a <see cref="TransactionId"/> to its underlying <see cref="Int64"/> value.
    /// </summary>
    public static explicit operator long (TransactionId value) => value.Value;
    public partial class TransactionIdTypeConverter : global::System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
    {
        public override bool CanConvertFrom(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Type sourceType)
        {
            return sourceType == typeof(long) || sourceType == typeof(string) || base.CanConvertFrom(context, sourceType);
        }

        public override object? ConvertFrom(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Globalization.CultureInfo? culture, object value)
        {
            return value switch
            {
                long longValue => new TransactionId(longValue),
                string stringValue when !string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringValue) && long.TryParse(stringValue, out var result) => new TransactionId(result),
                _ => base.ConvertFrom(context, culture, value),
            };
        }

        public override bool CanConvertTo(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Type? sourceType)
        {
            return sourceType == typeof(long) || sourceType == typeof(string) || base.CanConvertTo(context, sourceType);
        }

        public override object? ConvertTo(global::System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext? context, global::System.Globalization.CultureInfo? culture, object? value, global::System.Type destinationType)
        {
            if (value is TransactionId idValue)
            {
                if (destinationType == typeof(long))
                    return idValue.Value;
                if (destinationType == typeof(string))
                    return idValue.Value.ToString();
            }

            return base.ConvertTo(context, culture, value, destinationType);
        }
    }
